title: Ep. 465 - The Media Lie About Everything
description:
The IG testifies before the Senate, Trump gets called an anti-Semite for helping Jews, and Don Lemon melts down on air. Then, a study shows loneliness affects the young more than the old, and finally the Mailbag! Can't get enough of The Michael Knowles Show?
